channel.title: Free and Legit RuneScape MemberShip!
channel.description:
You sign up, you click things, you earn points and then you can buy RuneScape Membership, for free!
http://www.thersmg.com/2010/11/fast-free-runescape-30-member-ship.html
[b]Edit:[/b] May have found a better way: http://www.powerbot.org/vb/showthread.php?t=511751

I did it for about 10 minutes, only got 1.39 points, and no it would go any higher.

Thats odd, i got 68.7 points after an hour and a half doing surveys and watching southpark, and I didn’t use my credit card or phone or anything, you just need to set up a spam email address

well it works haha
[/quote]

After I get my 2 years of xbox gold membership lol

item.title: Free and Legit RuneScape MemberShip!
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:7, topic:371547”]Way to steal my site…

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=467471.msg3418062#msg3418062 date=1291264615]Also, I used to write for www.thersmg.com, they have some good guides.
[/quote]

But yea, this site is good for money making tips and other stuff. (You might see some of my guides on there if you look :P)[/quote]

Yeah thanks.

You put it out there, and I found this, so thought it’d be useful. Credits to you, really.

[quote=“rip4d, post:14, topic:371547”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=467631.msg3419747#msg3419747 date=1291423962]
All of them are shit where it’s all cool at first but then it wants my cell phone or something and you read the txt at the bottom and it wants to charge me 9.99$ for games and shit like that.
[/quote]222-222-2222

works on a good amount of them, Nexus quizes especially.[/quote]

^ this.

One accepted without a phone number, or it works with an old one or someone elses if you don’t like them.

Here use my old number: 07909758336 (UK +447909758336).
